Traits.Name: Antimagic	Susceptibility
Traits.Content:
The	armor	is	incapacitated	
while	in	the	area	of	an	antimagic	field. If	targeted	by	
dispel	magic,	the	armor	must	succeed	on	a

Traits.Name: False	Appearance
Traits.Content:
While	the	armor	remains	
motionless,	it	is	indistinguishable	from	a	normal	suit	of	
armor.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The	armor	makes	two	melee	attacks.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Content:
Melee	Weapon	Attack: +4	to	hit,	reach	5	ft.,	one	
target.	Hit: 5	(1d6	+	2)	bludgeoning	damage.
